dillon.gameAPI.gui

Interface GuiComponent

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicDialog, BlackoutImage, BlackoutText, Prompt

    public interface GuiComponent
    An interface that all gui components need to follow.
    Since:
    1.11
    Author:
    Dillon - Github dg092099
